title: Periodic Table of Mobility: A policy guidance tool by NUMO

description.part2: Switch language between English and Spanish using buttons above.

resultPage.part2: Please choose from the drop-down menu at the bottom

inputPanel.part2: Please choose from the drop-down menu at the bottom or input specific vehicle attributes.

inputHelp.noDescription: No information is available for this attribute.
inputHelp.noteText: The thresholds used for this attribute are based on literature and expert feedback collected by NUMO. A future version of this platform will include the ability to adjust these thresholds.

summary.harmfulSum: This vehicle may be very harmful
summary.harmful: Policies should be aimed at reducing its overall risk. Consider allocating less space for them while giving preference to others, requiring more data from operators, requiring a license to operate, or charging high fees to operate.
summary.lessHarmful: Policies should be aimed at reducing its overall risk. Consider allocating less space for them, requesting some data from operators, or charging some fees to operate.
summary.notHarmfulSum: This vehicle is not likely to be harmful
summary.notHarmful: Policies should be aimed at promoting its use. Consider allocating more space to them, don’t request too much data from operators, don’t require a license to operate, and consider subsidizing their usage.

city.title: Please describe your social goals
city.subtitle: Social goals are helpful to provide recomendations towards transport policies
city.placeholder2: Describe your social goals in terms of the main policies you have at the noational, local level and specific policies for transportation.
city.part1: Please rank your priorities for improvement acording to current city policies:

header.title: Periodic Table of Mobility
header.subtitle: A policy guidance tool by NUMO
header.part1: This platform helps assess the impact of any vehicle (existing or hypothetical) depending on its attributes. There are pre-loaded values that you can choose to learn the policy implications of existing vehicles. You can add customized characteristics, or create new vehicle types as well.
header.link: Learn why this tool exists and how to offer feedback.
